description:
When
Micah
told me his little brother might be interested in doing a solo or even more I was eager to see what his little brother looked like.
He sent some pics and I was like, "WOW, you two look a lot a like, and yikes, he is hot!"
A week or two passes and I finally go to book Tobin's flight, and realize his last name isn't the same as Micah's.
So I had to ask why the different last names. Different moms?
Turns out they aren't related in one small bit. They just have been friends for so long, and Micah has lived on and off with Tobin's family, that they both use the term "brother" loosely.
I dunno, maybe it's my jaded gayness, I can relate to the whole tight friendship, but calling your friend your brother is just kind of a part of male bonding that I just don't get without tossing in a little Bromance in my twisted gay porno mind.
No Bromance going on at all though. The two wouldn't even do a side-by-side jerk of. "Too weird!" they said, even though they have banged girls at the same time.
As for Tobin, he is quiet and a bit nervous. He is a little guy at 5 foot 6 or 7, but solid muscle and geez does he have a long dick on him. I think he is quite beautiful.
He seems fine with doing guy-on-guy stuff since Micah is doing it, so we will see how he does getting his dick sucked next. He is hard to schedule, so it might be a while, but I am pretty sure he will be back. Perhaps an Edge video?
title: Tobin - Solo
